pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Package for Multiple-Group Latent Class Analysis // Fits multiple-group latent class analysis (LCA) for exploring differences between populations in the data with a multilevel structure. There are two approaches to reflect group differences in glca: fixed-effect LCA (Bandeen-Roche et al (1997) doi:10.1080/01621459.1997.10473658; Clogg and Goodman (1985) doi:10.2307/270847) and nonparametric random-effect LCA (Vermunt (2003) doi:10.1111/j.0081-1750.2003.t01-1-00131.x).
